# gamefabric_service_account (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The unique name of the service account.

### Optional

- `labels` (Map of String) A map of labels to assign to the service account.

### Read-Only

- `email` (String) The email address for the service account (auto-generated).
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `password` (String, Sensitive) The password for the service account. Autogenerated and immutable.
